mapper.select: select ro.raw_order_num, c.client_actname, s.raw_code, rm.raw_name, rm.raw_color, ro.raw_order_count, s.stock_raw_count, rm.raw_price, ro.raw_order_date, ro.emp_id from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code order by ro.raw_order_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize};

select c.client_actname, rm.raw_code, rm.raw_name, rm.raw_price, rm.raw_color, COALESCE(s.stock_raw_count, 0) AS stock_raw_count from raw_material rm LEFT join stock s on s.raw_code = rm.raw_code join clients c on c.client_code = rm.client_code;

select count(*) from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code
rm.raw_name like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_name},'%' )
and ro.raw_order_num like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_order_num},'%' )
and c.client_actname like concat ( '%' ,#{client_actname},'%' )

select ro.raw_order_num, c.client_actname, s.raw_code, rm.raw_name, rm.raw_color, ro.raw_order_count, s.stock_raw_count, rm.raw_price, ro.raw_order_date, ro.emp_id from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code
rm.raw_name like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_name},'%' )
and ro.raw_order_num like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_order_num},'%' )
and c.client_actname like concat ( '%' ,#{client_actname},'%' )
order by ro.raw_order_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize};

select i.in_num,i.raw_order_num, c.client_actname, s.raw_code, rm.raw_name, rm.raw_color, ro.raw_order_count, s.stock_raw_count, rm.raw_price, i.in_date,ro.emp_id,i.in_YN from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN in_material i ON i.raw_order_num = ro.raw_order_num order by ro.raw_order_num desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(*) from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN in_material i ON i.raw_order_num = ro.raw_order_num
rm.raw_name like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_name},'%' )
and i.in_num like concat ( '%' ,#{in_num},'%' )
and c.client_actname like concat ( '%' ,#{client_actname},'%' )

select i.in_num, i.raw_order_num, c.client_actname, s.raw_code, rm.raw_name, rm.raw_color, ro.raw_order_count, s.stock_raw_count, rm.raw_price, i.in_date,ro.emp_id,i.in_YN from raw_order ro JOIN raw_material rm ON ro.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN clients c ON c.client_code = rm.client_code JOIN stock s ON s.raw_code = rm.raw_code JOIN in_material i ON i.raw_order_num = ro.raw_order_num
rm.raw_name like concat ( '%' ,#{raw_name},'%' )
and i.in_num like concat ( '%' ,#{in_num},'%' )
and c.client_actname like concat ( '%' ,#{client_actname},'%' )
order by c.client_code desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select w.wh_name,w.wh_dv,w.prod_code, p.prod_name, w.raw_code, r.raw_name, wh_addr ,wh_code, w.raw_code from warehouse w left join product p on p.prod_code = w.prod_code left join raw_material r on r.raw_code = w.raw_code limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize};

select count(*) from warehouse w left join product p on p.prod_code = w.prod_code left join raw_material r on r.raw_code = w.raw_code
wh_code like concat ( '%' ,#{wh_code},'%' )

select om.out_num, o.order_code,o.order_deliveryDate,o.order_date,om.emp_id, o.client_code,c.client_actname, o.emp_id, p.prod_code, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, om.out_date , om.out_YN , o.order_count, o.order_finish from product p JOIN orders o ON p.client_code = o.client_code join clients c on c.client_code = p.client_code left join out_material om on om.prod_code = p.prod_code limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
